string-array.name: defeat_quotes
string-array.item: Fall down seven times, get up eight. \n- Old Japanese Proverb
I\'ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed. \n- Michael Jordan
If they can make penicillin out of mouldy bread, they can sure make something out of you. \n- Muhammad Ali
I\'ve got a theory that if you give 100 percent all of the time, somehow things will work out in the end. \n- Larry Bird
Experience is the teacher of all things. \n- Julius Caesar
Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily. \n- Napoleon Bonaparte
